title: SOLID introduction
snippet: SOLID is a popular set of design principles that are used in object-oriented software development. SOLID is an acronym that stands for five key design principles: single responsibility principle, open-closed principle, Liskov substitution principle,...

title: Auto deploy by SSH via GitHub action
snippet: Create GitHub action to auto-deploy your project from any branch from the project repository. Create a new folder if does not exist at the root of your project .github/workflows and inside this folder create a deploy.yml...
